definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education

sentences.english: Drinking tea with honey is good for our health.
I knew that she could give me some beneficial tips.
sentences.chinese: 我知道她能給我很多有益的建議。

sentences.english: Long-haired breeds will benefit from daily attention to keep their coats smooth.
sentences.chinese: 每天注意要讓長毛品種兔子的皮毛滑順，對其有益。

sentences.english: Eating fish overall is greatly beneficial to your health, especially that of your brain.
sentences.chinese: 喫魚有益健康，特別是對您的大腦而言更是如此。

sentences.english: Is it beneficial to declare PHP anonymous functions outside a loop?
sentences.chinese: 它是有益的申報PHP匿名函數外循環？

sentences.english: Dieting is of great benefit to the over-weighted people.
sentences.chinese: 節制飲食對超重的人是非常有益的。

sentences.english: Through computation of axisymmetric shells, some useful conclusions are drawn.
sentences.chinese: 計算了軸對稱殼獲得了一些有益的結論。

sentences.english: Delicate smoked salmon provides a heart-healthy element to your table.
sentences.chinese: 精緻的薰三文魚爲您的餐桌增加有益心臟健康的元素。

sentences.english: Birding is a fun, rewarding hobby that is easy to get started with.
sentences.chinese: 觀鳥是一種有趣而有益的愛好，也也很容易起步。

sentences.english: I think it's very good for their health.--Lyudmila
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這非常有益於他們的健康。

sentences.english: Mage Armor no longer reduces the duration of beneficial magic buffs .
sentences.chinese: 法師護甲不再降低任何有益魔法的持續時間。

sentences.english: Lactobacillus acidophilus, or acidophilus for short, is one of the most useful organisms in your body.
sentences.chinese: 嗜酸乳桿菌，嗜酸或短，是最有益的生物在你的身體。

sentences.english: I start my day with Pilates breathing techniques that seem to be most beneficial for me.
sentences.chinese: 我以普拉提呼吸法開始每一天，這對我十分有益。

sentences.english: But who does such an empty diplomatic process serve?
sentences.chinese: 然而，這樣一場空洞的外交過程究竟對誰有益呢？

sentences.english: They have the ability to keep blood flowing which can be useful in tissues that doctors are trying to help heal.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟥可使血液流動，這對醫生想要治癒的組織有益。

sentences.english: Auto-control method was used in the experiment. 3 experiment gr…
sentences.chinese: 這對深入研究航天運動病防治方法是有益的。

definition: bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well
to be beneficial/to be good for
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
